channel.title: Server status page
channel.description:
hey i added my server to server status page. and this was the message it said
Welcome Knockscape! Further Action Required, Read: New server Knockscape 24-7 webclient succesfully entered, however it will not show up on the list until it has been verified and approved. Your server will now be checked by logging into it with the following credentials: Username: TxDxS Password: IyuMahn to make sure it is online, and if successful, it will be posted. You must register this username and password for me on your server and allow it to be logged into from the IP 69.39.224.55 The server will be deleted from the queue if not verified and logged into within 24 hours of posting. The server you posted, free2pk.no-ip.org, resolves to 88.159.240.69, which does not match your ip, 88.159.242.243. This means that you must verify that you own this IP by visiting this URL from the IP that you posted. If you have a browser on the machine, simply visit the following URL: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=verify&server=free2pk.no-ip.org&key=aytouNVnLn If you only have a command line, visit the URL with wget, curl, or an equivalent command to this: Code: wget -O- -q "http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=verify&server=free2pk.no-ip.org&key=aytouNVnLn" The message you recieve will tell you if verification was successful. If you have problems with this, PM Moparisthebest on the forums.
and i was ike wtf okee... i will go add it on my main pc, so i went to my pc registerd it and it said: this server has already been posted, but not yet approved, have some patience.! and i remember from my old servers i had this to and it never registered. so what ive to do know i dont get it what the link is he sended me cuz it just send a .php fle with saying the error not same IP ( btw i still got a server with 55% uptime on server status page but on other account) it is offline for like a half year but it wont go off the [page can someone just tell me what to do

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

use that id and password on your server

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @brofinch98 brofinch98
item.description:
@brofinch98 wrote:

Same problem with me… i got the id and pass now what do i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

You need to log onto it from the same computer that you registered it on.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @Knockscape Knockscape
item.description:
@Knockscape wrote:

hey i added my server to server status page.

and this was the message it said

Welcome Knockscape! Further Action Required, Read: New server Knockscape 24-7 webclient succesfully entered, however it will not show up on the list until it has been verified and approved. Your server will now be checked by logging into it with the following credentials: Username: TxDxS Password: IyuMahn to make sure it is online, and if successful, it will be posted. You must register this username and password for me on your server and allow it to be logged into from the IP 69.39.224.55 The server will be deleted from the queue if not verified and logged into within 24 hours of posting.

The server you posted, free2pk.no-ip.org, resolves to 88.159.240.69, which does not match your ip, 88.159.242.243.
This means that you must verify that you own this IP by visiting this URL from the IP that you posted.
If you have a browser on the machine, simply visit the following URL:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=verify&server=free2pk.no-ip.org&key=aytouNVnLn
If you only have a command line, visit the URL with wget, curl, or an equivalent command to this:

Code:
wget -O- -q “http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=verify&server=free2pk.no-ip.org&key=aytouNVnLn”
The message you recieve will tell you if verification was successful.
If you have problems with this, PM Moparisthebest on the forums.


and i was ike wtf okee… i will go add it on my main pc,
so i went to my pc registerd it and it said: this server has already been posted, but not yet approved, have some patience.!

and i remember from my old servers i had this to and it never registered.
so what ive to do know i dont get it what the link is he sended me cuz it just send a .php fle with saying the error not same IP
( btw i still got a server with 55% uptime on server status page but on other account)
it is offline for like a half year but it wont go off the [page
can someone just tell me what to do

Read full topic
